        public static <Type> org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Type> buildPage(Object result,
                                                                          org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable request,
                                                                          Class<Type> type,
                                                                          String recordsParam,
                                                                          String countParam)
        Builds paged response.
        Type Parameters:
        Type - Contained type.
        Parameters:
        result - JSON-RPC call response.
        request - Page request specification.
        type - Desired type class.
        recordsParam - Page content parameter name.
        countParam - Results count parameter name.
        Returns:
        Paged response.

      • buildPage

                                                                          org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable request,

        Builds paged response for the default parameters names (`{"records":[…],"count":X}`).

        Type - Contained type.
        Parameters:

      • dump

        public static <LocalType,TransferType> TransferType dump(LocalType entity,
                                                         org.springframework.core.convert.converter.Converter<LocalType,TransferType> strategy)
        Dumps entity into transfer POJO.
        Type Parameters:
        LocalType - Local persistent type (eg. database entity).
        TransferType - JSON-able transfer object type (in bast case a POJO class).
        Parameters:
        entity - Source entity.
        strategy - Dumping strategy that defines structure of destination object.
        Returns:
        Transfer POJO (NULL if entity is also NULL).
